about_the_game:
1. Introduction

First-person shooter game, red and blue factions, one side of the team is all wiped out, or the game time of this scene is up, then the end,

Move on to the next scene. Currently, there are 8 scenes, indoor and outdoor. 6 weapons, including pistols, rifles, sniper rifles,

Grenade. You can play alone or multiplayer over a LAN connection.

Before entering the game, select "Player" or "Observer" in the "Game Character" column; If you select Observer, then

Access to the game is only for viewing.

In the "Game Configuration" section, you can set the maximum number of players per team. Because it is a faction confrontation, it is necessary to secure the foundation

so the number of people on the team and the weapons used by the team members are the same. For example, the number of people here is set to 9, and after entering the game, the red side is

1 player + 8 NPCs, 9 NPCs for Blue. If a player joins Red, it will replace Red's NPC; If you join Blue, you will be replaced

NPCs on the blue side. Make sure that Red is 9 and Blue is also 9.

On the "Edit Map List" screen, you can select your favorite scene. Each scene can be equipped with different weapons and set up NPCs to shoot

Abilities, game length.

6 types of weapons, guns are to click to fire bullets, submachine guns hold down and shoot continuously; The grenade is held down for 1 second to release the throw, and the faster it is released, the closer it is thrown.

Players can't use guns as well as NPCs, especially sniper rifles. Therefore, the use of sniper rifles has been optimized for players, right-click to open the sniper view, within 1 second

Swipe across the scene and click on it, and the NPC that is crossed will be hit. Grenades and High Explosive grenades are area attacks and do not distinguish between friend and foe. Sniper rifles and high-explosive grenades

's damage is maximum, and it's easy to inflict instant kills, with grenades and pistols being minimal. Both bullets and grenades are unlimited and can be used as much as you want.

Choose a scene with low difficulty, complete with a grenade or pistol, and set the NPC's shooting ability to low, this is a light-hearted and leisurely mini-game. choose

Difficult scenes, equipped with sniper rifles, are challenging games. A combination of different choices to form a game with different experiences. Against NPCs, against players,

It's a different experience again. If you choose Observer Mode, you can enjoy other players performing.

2. Buttons

1. WSAD, mobile. Left mouse button, attack, right button, sniper view.

2. C, Squat. Space, jump. Left Shift, scroll.

3. Esc, or M, toggle between game view and UI view, UI view shows the mouse, you can click the exit button in the lower left corner, or faintly in the lower right corner

Hide the interface buttons.

4. The player is in observer mode, J, and the camera follows the other person. L, the perspective follows your side. Letter I, angle of view switching. WSAD, Navigation. QE, lifting.

3. Gamepads

The game supports gamepad operation of characters, but does not support UI operation.

Handle Left Shoulder Button = Left Button, Handle Right Button = Right Button.

Handle A = C, Handle Y = Space, Handle Right Trigger = Left Shift.

Handle arrow keys left = J, handle arrow keys right = L, handle arrow keys = letter I.

Observer mode can be navigated, but does not support lifting.

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
